abstract: The private equity firms Carlyle Group and General Atlantic are in discussions to invest as much as $200 million in FlipKart of India, Reuters reports.
snippet: The private equity firms Carlyle Group and General Atlantic are in discussions to invest as much as $200 million in FlipKart of India, Reuters reports.
lead_paragraph: The private equity firms Carlyle Group and General Atlantic are in discussions to invest as much as $200 million in FlipKart, India's answer to Amazon, reports Reuters, citing unidentified people. Read more »

headline.main: Carlyle in Talks on FlipKart Investment
